sentences.sContent: After a little gentle persuasion , Debbie agreed to let us in.
sentences.sCn: 好言劝说了几句后，黛比就同意让我们进去了。

sentences.sContent: It had taken a great deal of persuasion to get him to accept.
sentences.sCn: 费尽了口舌才让他接受。

sentences.sContent: She used all her powers of persuasion (= skill at persuading people ) to convince Tilly that it was the right thing to do.
sentences.sCn: 她使尽浑身解数，才劝服蒂莉应该那么做。

words.tran: 有说服力的；劝诱的，劝说的
说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事

trans.tranOther: the act of persuading someone to do something
